name: Tenchi o Kurau II: Sekiheki no Tatakai
overview: Tenchi o Kurau 2: Sekiheki no Tatakai, is a side-scrolling beat-'em-up produced by Capcom first released as a coin-operated arcade game in 1992. It is the second arcade game based on the Tenchi wo Kurau manga, following Dynasty Wars. Japanese only home versions of the Sega Saturn and PlayStation were released in 1996.
